title: Sorrow
creator_credit: Peter Sasdy, Barry Levinson and Hemisphere Productions
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Storybook International”.
Two brothers are left the same amount of money, but through a series of mishaps one brother becomes poor and his rich brother will do nothing to help him. The tale compares how they both deal with Sorrow and Envy when they meet them. An Hungarian tale.
